recipe.title: Shareable Avocado Toast (Libra) Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; mini mozzarella ball, halved ; (50 g)
½ cup ; cherry tomatoes, halved ; (100 g)
¼ cup ; fresh basil leaf ; (10 g)

steps.step: Scoop the avocado into a medium bowl. Season with salt and add the lemon juice. Mash until smooth.
Cut the slice of toast in half crosswise, then spread the avocado on the toast. Top with the mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and flaky salt.
